45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Tha'1abah bin Zahdam said:"Some people from Banu Tha'labah came to the Prophet (ﷺ) when he was delivering a speech and a man said: 'O Messenger of Allah, these are Banu Tha'labah bin Yarbu' who killed so and so' - one of the Companions of the Prophet (ﷺ). The Prophet (ﷺ) said: 'No soul is affected by the sin of another

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُؤْخَذُ أَحَدٌ بِجَرِيرَةِ غَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Can Anyone Be Blamed For The sin Of Another?
